Plot:

One spirit waiting for revenge, another spirit cursed for being the replacement, Porn and Sunee fought at a house. Sunee Died. Porn sewed her mouth with holy string to control her revengeful spirit. Then Porn and Chai buried her under the tree.

25 years later, Ton and Mook spent their honeymoon at a resort. At night the ghost Sunee haunted Mook and killed all labors... 

A newlywed couple goes on a honeymoon to Thailand. Unfortunately there&#039;s someone there waiting for them, someone with evil intentions. 25 years ago a girl was killed and buried there. Now the couple has to try to escape this ghostly nightmare.
